elements.text:
You've been texting with someone you really like and they're usually quick to respond. You notice that they saw your message a couple of hours ago and did not respond. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: They may not be interested in me romantically, but I can move on to someone else.
They may think I'm boring, but no one is interesting all the time.
I am a nice person to talk to.
